metadata.name: Lamivudine 300 mg film coated tablets
metadata.composition: Each film coated tablet contains 300 mg lamivudine For the full list of

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Lamivudine is indicated as part of antiretroviral combination therapy for the treatment of Human Immunodeficiency Virus HIV infected adults and children

contraindications.disease: Hypersensitivity to the active substance or to any of the excipients listed in section 6 1
contraindications.excipients: Cellulose, Microcrystalline (E460);Sodium Starch Glycolate (Type A);Magnesium Stearate (E572);Hypromellose (3cps) (E464);Hypromellose (6cps) (E464);Titanium Dioxide (E171);Macrogol (400);Polysorbate 80 (E433);Iron oxide black (E172)
